column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute of Chicago is a world class museum with an impressive collection
column2: and it is easily one of the crowning gems of the city.  If you have never visited the Art Institute
column3: then you are missing out on a chance to experience some truly magnificent works of art.  If you have visited in the past
column4: then it never hurts to take another look
column5: as the institute's collection is large enough that only a portion of it is ever on display at one time
column6: so there is always something you may have missed.  I am always finding new wonders within these halls and try to make it out for the various special exhibits whenever possible.
